definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这就是校园欺负运行操场和全球教父做到无处不在。

sentences.english: It will take place on the day of the Lantern Festival on the Yanshui Junior High School athletic field.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动将在元宵节当天于盐水国中操场进行施放。

sentences.english: We were ----- ------in the playground when the bell ----.
sentences.chinese: 当铃响的时候我们正在操场上玩。

sentences.english: The playground has been railed in.
The delayed player delegine stay on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 被耽延的运鼓动代表团停留在操场上。

sentences.english: We play basketball on the sports ground.
Behind the teaching building is the playground. The computer room is next to it.
sentences.chinese: 教教楼后是操场，计算机房挨灭它。

sentences.english: On the playground , Gogo and Jenny are playing with Peter .
sentences.chinese: 在操场上，勾勾和杰妮在和彼德玩。

sentences.english: There is going to be a get-together at the playground tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天将在操场上举行联欢会。

sentences.english: I used to see Zheng Zhi play football on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我过去经常看到郑智在操场上踢足球。

sentences.english: They are playing basketball either on the playground or in the gym .
sentences.chinese: 他们要么正在操场上或者在体育馆里打篮球。

sentences.english: The children were taking turns on the slides in the playground.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在操场上轮流滑滑梯。

sentences.english: Inspect the playground area for safety as well.
sentences.chinese: 另外你还要检查操场区域是否安全。

sentences.english: During the break, the sportsground rang with happy shouts.
sentences.chinese: 课间休息时，操场上回响着欢快的叫声。

sentences.english: After the class, all the students charged into the playground.
sentences.chinese: 下课后所有孩子都冲到了操场上。

sentences.english: We had great fun playing football in the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我们在操场踢足球玩得好开心。

definition: setting-up exercises during the break (between classes)
